model

Class DescriptionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DescriptionTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlphaTree, BetaTree

    public abstract class DescriptionTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Author:
    Scott Spiers University of Strathclyde Final Year Project: Description Trees Supervisor: Sergey Kitaev Abstract Class providing abstract methods for valuating trees Majority of functionality invokes functions on a Tree object

      • printTree

        public java.lang.String printTree()
        Prints a textual representation of the tree. This is done by having node values stored in lists according to level which are then manipulated to get node values into the correct position These lists are then converted to strings and connections are drawn
        Returns:
        the string representation of the tree
